query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'customers' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user yFD1LgCQZpYvvRU.bf8f809b86e6 --database TNJ63V8zyGtgPp2otD5Au5 --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'customers' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
stdout:
column_name	data_type
id	int
name	varchar
